item.title: AI-based Financial Fraud Evaluation Assistant
item.description: Using AI to lower the false-positives in detected fraudulent transactions

item.description: Predicting wear, extending life: intelligent maintenance for lasting performance

item.description: Enhancing efficiency in the energy market through Data Science and System Innovation

item.title: Data Science & Business Intelligence
item.description: Harness the power of data science and machine learning with our team of highly educated experts. We transform raw data into actionable insights, driving innovation and informed decision-making. Let us help you unlock the potential of your data to achieve your business goals!

item.title: Enhancing Production Processes Using Sensor Data
item.description: Transforming sensor data into actionable insights to reduce costs and improve product quality.

item.title: Evaluation of Slugging Severity in Oil and Gas
item.description: A comprehensive framework to evaluate and mitigate slugging severity in oil and gas systems, enhancing reliability, reducing costs, and supporting future operational planning.

item.title: Flowmeter Calibration
item.description: Using statistical analysis to reduce loss in production due to calibration routines

item.title: Fraud Detection
item.description: Development of transactions monitoring system for fraud detection in financial institution

item.title: Production Optimization of Reservoirs in the North Sea
item.description: An integral approach to mitigate production losses due to solid influx

item.title: Smart Monitoring System
item.description: A recommender system to identify causes of high oil-in-water concentrations

item.title: Treat Smart
item.description: We developed an application that uses a machine learning model trained on operational and weather data to predict the rate and composition of wastewater, optimizing chemical usage and reducing costs at treatment plants.
